title: Regulatory Requirement Comparison
description: Compare regulatory requirements across different regions
example_prompt: Compare regulatory requirements for our product across different regions. Identify key differences, compliance gaps, and required actions for each market.

environmentVariables.name: document_name
environmentVariables.description: The name/title of the regulatory document being compared

environmentVariables.name: prior_version_url
environmentVariables.description: URL to the previous version of the document

environmentVariables.name: final_version_url
environmentVariables.description: URL to the final/current version of the document
